    level="1"
    right="Item 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Striking Snare](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3387)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=564" />
<trait label="Mechanical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=646" />
<trait label="Snare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=809" />
<trait label="Trap" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=715" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 300 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Price** 75 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

You affix a trip line or other trigger to a group of either stones or wooden stakes to strike a creature that enters the snare's square. The creature must attempt a DC 26 [basic](/Actions.aspx?ID=2765) Reflex saving throw. If you choose stones when you [Craft](/Actions.aspx?ID=2385) the snare, it deals 9d8 bludgeoning damage; if you choose spikes, it deals 9d8 piercing damage.
